product_name: Garmin Extended Out-front Bike Computer Mount
long_description: Keep your eyes on the road! The Garmin Extended Out-front Bike Computer Mount allows you to stay in a comfortable heads-up position while you read your Garmin bike computer.
short_description: Keep your eyes on the road! The Garmin Extended Out-front Bike Computer Mount allows you to stay in a comfortable heads-up position while you read your Garmin bike computer.
